definition: the matter should not be delayed/there's no time to lose
It is better to squash enmity rather than keeping it alive (proverb)

sentences.english: The past is a good place to visit, but certainly not a good place to stay.

sentences.english: The doctor said my wife was too near her term to travel by air.

sentences.english: Some clothes are not the advisability of using either washing machines wash, or it will lose.

sentences.english: A man should not want to carve out his meat to an ounce before-hand.

sentences.english: She said it would be inappropriate to comment further.

sentences.english: Food with a lot of fat should be watched carefully - cooking to for too long can lead to burning.
sentences.chinese: 不宜長時間烹煮油脂重的食物，以免油脂過熱發煙。

sentences.english: Eric understands that regardless of whose fault it was, he should not make any further investigation.

definition: to be jealous of/fear/dread/scruple/to avoid or abstain from/to quit/to give up sth
to avoid as taboo/to avoid by all means
in order to avoid/so as not to
best/(you) had better (do what we suggest)
timely/at the right moment/appropriate to the occasion/opportune/to fit current fashion
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
(so as) to avoid/to prevent/(just) in case
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
